SearchFileSet
public class AllBufferSet
extends BufferListSet

A file set for searching all open buffers.

バージョン:
$Id: AllBufferSet.java 23221 2013-09-29 20:03:32Z shlomy $
作成者:

          Creates a new all buffer set.
